Class ConsoleUtils

java.lang.Object
main.utils.ConsoleUtils
public class ConsoleUtils extends Object
Utility class for console input and validation. Provides methods for reading and validating user input from the console. Used by boundary classes such as HDBManagerUI.
Since:
2025-04-17

  • Method Details

    • readIntWithValidation

      public static int readIntWithValidation(String prompt, String errorMessage, int min, int max)
      Reads an integer from the user within a specified range, with validation.
      Parameters:
      prompt - The prompt to display to the user.
      errorMessage - The error message to display for invalid input.
      min - The minimum acceptable value (inclusive).
      max - The maximum acceptable value (inclusive).
      Returns:
      The validated integer input.

    • readNonEmptyString

      public static String readNonEmptyString(String prompt)
      Reads a non-empty string from the user.
      Parameters:
      prompt - The prompt to display.
      Returns:
      The non-empty string entered by the user.

    • readOptionalInput

      public static String readOptionalInput(String prompt)
      Reads an optional string input from the user (may be empty).
      Parameters:
      prompt - The prompt to display.
      Returns:
      The string entered by the user (may be empty).

    • confirmAction

      public static boolean confirmAction(String prompt)
      Asks the user to confirm an action (Y/N).
      Parameters:
      prompt - The confirmation prompt.
      Returns:
      true if the user confirms (Y/Yes), false otherwise (N/No).

    • pressEnterToContinue

      public static void pressEnterToContinue(String message)
      Prompts the user to press Enter to continue.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to display (default: "Press Enter to continue...").

    • pressEnterToContinue

      public static void pressEnterToContinue()
      Prompts the user to press Enter to continue (default message).

    • displayMenu

      public static int displayMenu(String title, String[] options)
      Displays a menu with numbered options and prompts the user for a choice. Returns the index (starting from 0) of the selected option, or -1 if cancelled.
      Parameters:
      title - The menu title to display.
      options - The list of options to display.
      Returns:
      The index of the selected option (0-based), or -1 if user cancels.

    • displayTableHeader

      public static void displayTableHeader(String[] headers, int[] widths)
      Displays a table header with column names and specified column widths.
      Parameters:
      headers - Array of column header names.
      widths - Array of column widths (should match headers.length).

    • displayTableRow

      public static void displayTableRow(String[] values, int[] widths)
      Displays a table row with values and specified column widths.
      Parameters:
      values - Array of values for the row.
      widths - Array of column widths (should match values.length).

    • readPasswordMasked

      public static String readPasswordMasked(String prompt)

    • readNonEmptyInput

      public static String readNonEmptyInput(String prompt)
      Reads non-empty input from user with a custom prompt
      Parameters:
      prompt - The message to display to the user
      Returns:
      Non-empty string input
